title: [WORK] Ep. 11: “How to achieve greatness” w/ Jay Abraham
description:
This week's episode of the You Turn podcast features Jay Abraham — author, mentor, and the godfather of marketing. Jay is one of the world's most influential executives and coaches, and talks to Ashley about a multitude of incredibly helpful things, including developing the "you attitude." Tune in to learn how to better market yourself, stand up for what you're worth, and discover what greatness looks like in your life. Jay has limitless personal anecdotes about how to discover your value and worth as an employee and person, and how to reach the level of success you desire. Don't forget to stay tuned for Ashley's post-episode thoughts!

 

 

The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Stephen R. Covey

 

Check out Jay Abraham’s website: www.abraham.com
